page.title: 19TRANSPORT AROUND AYLESFORD
page.content: Maidstone and District Bus Co buses serve the area on routes between Maidstone and Chatham.Services are well used by both commuters,schoolchildren and shoppers visiting the County Town.Narrow lanes,hardly adequate for horse-drawn vehicles,are constantly pounded by heavily laden,articulated lorries,seeking the industrial complex,frequently making two or more journeys due to inadequate signposting.Foreign vehicles add to the mayhem.Safeways have 170 trailers distributing goods frome their warehouse,plus an equal number bringing goods inwards.Nearly all employees travel to and from work by car,thus congesting the village.Pollution from exhaust fumes causes untold damage to buildings and humans.
